what: An R package for crabs data
title: Perform multiple calculation for processing and analyzing crab's data.
text: Welcome Adhikari1.pkg designed streamline data analysis process providing comprehensive set tools data cleaning, analysis, mutation. Whether data scientist, analyst, researcher, package empowers essential functions enhance data manipulation visualization capabilities.

title: Perform multiple calculation for processing and analyzing crab's data.
text: na_omit: Easily handle missing values datasets removing imputing . mutate: Transform modify datasets powerful mutation function, allowing create new variables based existing ones.
